Verb *listen*
**************

Documentation for the listen verb in */cmds/verbs/listen.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``listen``
 |  ``listen to <something>``
 |  ``listen to <something> with <item>``

Listen to your heart, the sounds in the room, listen to the wall with a glass.
